sentence.Network_en: The new building does not harmonize with its surroundings.
sentence.Network_cn: 那栋新楼与周围环境不协调。

sentence.Network_cn: 布雷默和加兰为主题曲《相逢圣路易斯》配和声。

sentence.Network_cn: 尽管芭芭拉·怀特和她的母亲音乐品味不太一致，她们还是喜欢一起听音乐。

derivation.yuyuan_name: late 15th cent. (in the sense 'sing or play in harmony'): from French harmoniser, from harmonie (see harmony)

entry.def: If two or more things harmonize with each other, they fit in well with each other.

example.ex: ...slabs of pink and beige stone that harmonize with the carpet...
example.tran: 与地毯协调搭配的粉色和米色相间的石板

example.ex: Barbara White and her mother like to listen to music together, though their tastes don't harmonize.
example.tran: 尽管芭芭拉·怀特和她的母亲音乐品味不太一致，她们还是喜欢一起听音乐。

entry.tran: 使（法律、制度或规则）协调;使统一
entry.def: When governments or organizations harmonize laws, systems, or regulations, they agree in a friendly way to make them the same or similar.

example.ex: How far will members have progressed towards harmonising their economies?
example.tran: 各成员国在使彼此经济协调一致的进程上会有多大进展？

entry.tran: 用和声唱（或演奏）;为（主调）配和声
entry.def: When people harmonize, they sing or play notes which are different from the main tune but which sound nice with it.

example.ex: Bremer and Garland harmonize on the title song, 'Meet Me in St. Louis'.
example.tran: 布雷默和加兰为主题曲《相逢圣路易斯》配和声。

means.word_mean: 4. bring into consonance or relate harmoniously;
6. bring into consonance, harmony, or accord while making music or singing

auth_sentence.content: I...pick out colors that harmonize with what I planted last year.
auth_sentence.res_content: I...pick out colors that harmonize with what I planted last year.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: I...pick out colors that harmonize with what I planted last year.

sentences.en: The colours do not seem to harmonize (with each other) at all.
sentences.cn: 这些颜色显得一点也不协调。

sentences.en: The singing teacher taught them to harmonize the new song.
sentences.cn: 音乐教师教他们用和声演唱这首新歌。
